natural_language_query: show me all the products where the category is "large bottled drinks"
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = "large bottled drinks"

natural_language_query: show me all the products where the category is crisps
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = "crisps"

natural_language_query: show me all the products where the category is "hot drinks"
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = "hot drinks"

natural_language_query: show me all the products where the category is "biscuits" or the category is "hot drinks"
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = "biscuits" OR category = "hot drinks"

natural_language_query: show me all the products that has a price less than 1
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 1

natural_language_query: show me all the products that has a price more than 1
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 1

natural_language_query: show me all the products where the price is greater than 1 and the price is less than 2
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 1 AND price < 2

natural_language_query: show me all the products that has a price less than 1 or a price greater than 2
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 1 OR price > 2

natural_language_query: show me the brand and itemname from products
SQL_query: SELECT brand, itemname FROM products

natural_language_query: show me the brand and itemname from products where the category is crisps and the price is greater than 1
SQL_query: SELECT brand, itemname FROM products WHERE category = "crisps" AND price > 1

natural_language_query: show me maximum price products
SQL_query: SELECT MAX(price) FROM products

natural_language_query: show me the minimum price products
SQL_query: SELECT MIN(price) FROM products

natural_language_query: show me the average price products
SQL_query: SELECT AVG(price) FROM products

natural_language_query: show me all the products where the brand is cadbury
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE brand = "cadbury"

natural_language_query: show me all the products where the brand is cadbury or the brand is evian
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE brand = "cadbury" OR brand = "evian"

natural_language_query: show me the brand of all the products
SQL_query: SELECT brand FROM products

natural_language_query: show me the brand of all the products where the category is crisps
SQL_query: SELECT brand FROM products WHERE category = "crisps"

natural_language_query: show me the brand of all the products where the category is crisps and the brand is walkers
SQL_query: SELECT brand FROM products WHERE category = "crisps" and brand = “walkers”

natural_language_query: show me the price and itemname of all the products
SQL_query: SELECT price, itemname FROM products

natural_language_query: show me the price and itemname of all the products in the crisps category
SQL_query: SELECT price, itemname FROM products WHERE category = "Crisps"

natural_language_query: show me the products where the size is 1 and the unit is ltr
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE size = 1 AND unit = "ltr"

natural_language_query: show me the products where the size greater than 1 and the unit is ltr
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE size > 1 AND unit = "ltr"

natural_language_query: show me the products where the size is less than 1 and the unit is ltr
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE size < 1 AND unit = "ltr"

natural_language_query: show me the products where the size is 500 and the unit is ml
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE size = 500 AND unit = "ml"

natural_language_query: show me the products where the size is greater than 500 and the unit is ml
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE size > 500 AND unit = "ml"

natural_language_query: show me the products where the size less than 500 and the unit is ml
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE size < 500 AND unit = "ml"

natural_language_query: show me all the products where the size is less than 600 and the size is greater than 200 and the unit is ml
SQL_query: SELECT * FROM products WHERE size < 600 AND unit = "ml" and size > 200 and unit = "ml"

natural_language_query: show me the brand and the itemname of all the products where the size is 1 and the unit is ltr
SQL_query: SELECT brand, itemname FROM products WHERE size = 1 and unit = “ltr”

natural_language_query: show me the brand and the itemname of all the products where the size is greater than 10 and the unit is g and in the category is crisps
SQL_query: SELECT brand, itemname FROM products WHERE size > 10 and unit = "g" AND category = "crisps"

natural_language_query: show me the unique category from products
SQL_query: SELECT DISTINCT products.category FROM products
